Continuous Dehumidification Mode ensures the dehumidifier runs continuously and rapidly lowers room humidity to the minimum level. These three different functions enable the dehumidifier to solve more problems for you!

Operates quietly at only 40 db, ensuring it doesn't disturb your daily life and rest!

Continuous drainage: Our dehumidifier comes with a drain hose, which can be easily connected to your dehumidifier's outlet for continuous drainage.
